queryMap.query: SELECT /* tbec_racer_edu_data_fc001 */ T1.RACER_NO , T2.NM_KOR , T2.RACER_PERIO_NO , T3.RACER_GRD_CD , T1.TMS , T1.DAY_ORD , SUBSTR(XMLAGG(XMLELEMENT(A,' / ' || T1.RANK) ORDER BY RACE_NO).EXTRACT('//text()'),3) RANK -- 일차별로 순위를 / 로 구분하여 한 Column으로 표시, Row 를 Column으로 표시하는 함수, 하루에 2경주 이상 참여시. , SUM(T1.RANK) RANK_SUM , COUNT(T1.RANK) RANK_CNT FROM TBEB_ORGAN T1, TBEC_RACER_MASTER T2 , ( SELECT DISTINCT T1.RACER_NO, RACER_GRD_CD -- 선수 등급을 편성Table에서 읽음. FROM TBEB_ORGAN T1 , ( SELECT RACER_NO, MAX(TMS) TMS -- 검색기간중 선수별 마지막 회차 읽기 FROM TBEB_ORGAN WHERE STND_YEAR = ? AND MBR_CD = ? AND TMS BETWEEN ? AND ? GROUP BY RACER_NO) T2 WHERE T1.RACER_NO = T2.RACER_NO AND T1.TMS = T2.TMS AND T1.STND_YEAR = ? ) T3 WHERE T1.RACER_NO = T2.RACER_NO AND T1.RACER_NO = T3.RACER_NO AND T1.STND_YEAR = ? AND T1.MBR_CD = ? AND T1.TMS BETWEEN ? AND ? AND T1.RANK IS NOT NULL AND T2.NM_KOR LIKE '%' ||NVL(?, T2.NM_KOR)|| '%' GROUP BY T1.RACER_NO , T2.NM_KOR , T2.RACER_PERIO_NO , T3.RACER_GRD_CD , T1.TMS , T1.DAY_ORD ORDER BY T1.RACER_NO, T1.TMS, T1.DAY_ORD

SELECT /* tbec_racer_edu_data_fc002 */ T1.RACER_NO , T1.NM_KOR , T1.RACER_PERIO_NO , T1.RACER_GRD_CD , T2.TMS , T2.ETC FROM TBEC_RACER_MASTER T1, TBEC_RACER_INTERVIEW T2 WHERE T1.RACER_NO = T2.RACER_NO AND T2.STND_YEAR = ? AND T2.MBR_CD = ? AND T2.TMS BETWEEN ? AND ? AND T1.NM_KOR LIKE '%' || NVL(?, T1.NM_KOR) || '%' ORDER BY T1.RACER_NO, T2.TMS

-- 화요일 2R, 수/목요일 1R SELECT /* tbec_racer_edu_data_fc003 */ T1.RACER_NO , T2.NM_KOR , T2.RACER_PERIO_NO , T2.RACER_GRD_CD , T1.TMS , T1.DAY_ORD , DAY_ORD + 1 SORT_ORD , TO_CHAR(T1.START_TM_1, '0.99') START_TM_1 , TO_CHAR(T1.START_TM_2, '0.99') START_TM_2 , TO_CHAR(T1.START_TM_3, '0.99') START_TM_3 , TO_CHAR(T1.RUN_TM, '0.99') RUN_TM FROM TBEC_APPO_EXERC_ORGAN T1, TBEC_RACER_MASTER T2 WHERE T1.RACER_NO = T2.RACER_NO AND T1.STND_YEAR = ? AND T1.MBR_CD = ? AND T1.TMS BETWEEN ? AND ? AND T2.NM_KOR LIKE '%' || NVL(?, T2.NM_KOR) || '%' UNION -- 화요일 1R SELECT T1.RACER_NO , T2.NM_KOR , T2.RACER_PERIO_NO , T2.RACER_GRD_CD , T1.TMS , T1.DAY_ORD , 0 SORT_ORD , TO_CHAR(T1.START_TM_1_0, '0.99') START_TM_1 , TO_CHAR(T1.START_TM_2_0, '0.99') START_TM_2 , TO_CHAR(T1.START_TM_3_0, '0.99') START_TM_3 , TO_CHAR(T1.RUN_TM_0, '0.99') RUN_TM FROM TBEC_APPO_EXERC_ORGAN T1, TBEC_RACER_MASTER T2 WHERE T1.RACER_NO = T2.RACER_NO AND T1.STND_YEAR = ? AND T1.MBR_CD = ? AND T1.TMS BETWEEN ? AND ? AND T2.NM_KOR LIKE '%' || NVL(?, T2.NM_KOR) || '%' AND T1.DAY_ORD = 0 ORDER BY RACER_NO, TMS, SORT_ORD

SELECT /* tbec_racer_edu_data_fc004 플라잉 경주만 조회 */ T1.RACER_NO , T2.NM_KOR , T2.RACER_PERIO_NO , T3.RACER_GRD_CD , T1.TMS , T1.DAY_ORD , SUBSTR(XMLAGG(XMLELEMENT(A,' /' || TO_CHAR(T1.STAR_TM,'0.99')) ORDER BY RACE_NO).EXTRACT('//text()'),3) STAR_TM -- 일차별로 스타트타임을 / 로 구분하여 한 Column으로 표시 Row를 Column으로 바꾸는 함수. , SUM(DECODE(T1.ST_MTHD_CD, '001', 0, T1.STAR_TM)) STAR_TM_SUM -- 선수별 스타트타임 합, 평균 값 계산에 필요 , SUM(DECODE(T1.ST_MTHD_CD, '001', 0, 1)) STAR_TM_CNT -- 선수별 스타트타임 수(경주 참여수), 평균값 계산에 필요 FROM TBEB_ORGAN T1, TBEC_RACER_MASTER T2 , ( SELECT DISTINCT T1.RACER_NO, RACER_GRD_CD -- 선수 등급을 편성Table에서 읽음. FROM TBEB_ORGAN T1 , ( SELECT RACER_NO, MAX(TMS) TMS -- 검색기간중 선수별 마지막 회차 읽기 FROM TBEB_ORGAN WHERE STND_YEAR = ? AND MBR_CD = ? AND TMS BETWEEN ? AND ? GROUP BY RACER_NO) T2 WHERE T1.RACER_NO = T2.RACER_NO AND T1.TMS = T2.TMS AND T1.STND_YEAR = ? ) T3 WHERE T1.RACER_NO = T2.RACER_NO AND T1.RACER_NO = T3.RACER_NO AND T1.STND_YEAR = ? AND T1.MBR_CD = ? AND T1.TMS BETWEEN ? AND ? AND T1.STAR_TM IS NOT NULL AND T2.NM_KOR LIKE '%' ||NVL(?, T2.NM_KOR)|| '%' GROUP BY T1.RACER_NO , T2.NM_KOR , T2.RACER_PERIO_NO , T3.RACER_GRD_CD , T1.TMS , T1.DAY_ORD ORDER BY T1.RACER_NO, T1.TMS, T1.DAY_ORD

SELECT /* tbec_racer_edu_data_fc005 */ TRVA.RACER_NO , TRM.NM_KOR , TRM.RACER_PERIO_NO , TRM.RACER_GRD_CD , TRVA.VOIL_CD , TSC.CD_NM VOIL_NM , NVL(DECODE(TRST.QURT_CD, '001', TRRAS.BF_AVG_ACDNT_SCR, '002', TRRAS.AF_AVG_ACDNT_SCR), 0) AVG_ACDNT_SCR -- 성적반영분기코드에 따라 전/후반기 평균 사고점 표시 , COUNT(TRVA.VOIL_CD) VOIL_CNT FROM TBED_RACE_VOIL_ACT TRVA , TBEC_RACER_MASTER TRM , TBEA_SPEC_CD TSC , TBEB_RECD_STND_TERM TRST -- 성적반영분기코드 , TBEB_RACE_TMS TRT , ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY TRRAS.RACER_NO ORDER BY APLY_DT DESC) RANK , TRRAS.* FROM TBEB_RACER_RECD_ACCU_SUM TRRAS WHERE TRRAS.APLY_DT < ( SELECT MIN(TRDO.RACE_DAY) RACE_DAY FROM TBEB_RACE_DAY_ORD TRDO WHERE TRDO.STND_YEAR = ? AND TRDO.MBR_CD = ? AND TRDO.TMS = ? ) AND MBR_CD = '000' AND TMS = 0 AND TRRAS.ST_MTHD_CD = '000' --ST방식전체설정 ) WHERE RANK = 1 ) TRRAS -- 선수최근성적 WHERE TRVA.STND_YEAR = ? AND TRVA.MBR_CD = ? AND TRVA.TMS BETWEEN ? AND ? AND TRM.NM_KOR LIKE '%' ||NVL(?, TRM.NM_KOR)|| '%' AND TSC.GRP_CD = 'E00035' AND TRVA.RACER_NO = TRM.RACER_NO AND TRVA.VOIL_CD = TSC.CD AND TRVA.VOIL_CD IS NOT NULL AND TRVA.STND_YEAR = TRT.STND_YEAR AND TRVA.MBR_CD = TRT.MBR_CD AND TRT.STR_DT >= TRST.STR_DT AND TRT.END_DT <= TRST.END_DT AND TRT.TMS = ? AND TRVA.RACER_NO = TRRAS.RACER_NO GROUP BY TRVA.RACER_NO , TRM.NM_KOR , TRM.RACER_PERIO_NO , TRM.RACER_GRD_CD , TRVA.VOIL_CD , TSC.CD_NM , NVL(DECODE(TRST.QURT_CD, '001', TRRAS.BF_AVG_ACDNT_SCR, '002', TRRAS.AF_AVG_ACDNT_SCR), 0) ORDER BY TRVA.RACER_NO, TRVA.VOIL_CD

SELECT /* tbec_racer_edu_data_fc006 */ A.*, B.SUPP_TOT_AMT FROM ( -- 화요일 2R, 수,목 1R 성적 SELECT T1.RACE_NO , T1.RACER_NO , T2.NM_KOR , T2.RACER_PERIO_NO , T1.RACER_GRD_CD , T1.RACE_REG_NO , T1.RANK , TO_CHAR(T1.STAR_TM, '0.99') STAR_TM , NVL(T3.DAY_ORD, 0) DAY_ORD , NVL(T3.DAY_ORD, 0) + 1 SORT_ORD , REPLACE(CASE WHEN START_FLYING_CNT_1 > 0 THEN 'F' WHEN START_LATE_CNT_1 > 0 THEN 'L' END || TO_CHAR(T3.START_TM_1, '0.99'), ' ', '') START_TM_1 --F, L이 있으면 항주타임에 같이 표시 , REPLACE(CASE WHEN START_FLYING_CNT_2 > 0 THEN 'F' WHEN START_LATE_CNT_2 > 0 THEN 'L' END || TO_CHAR(T3.START_TM_2, '0.99'), ' ', '') START_TM_2 --F, L이 있으면 항주타임에 같이 표시 , REPLACE(CASE WHEN START_FLYING_CNT_3 > 0 THEN 'F' WHEN START_LATE_CNT_3 > 0 THEN 'L' END || TO_CHAR(T3.START_TM_3, '0.99'), ' ', '') START_TM_3 --F, L이 있으면 항주타임에 같이 표시 , TO_CHAR(T3.RUN_TM, '0.99') RUN_TM , T3.RACE_DY FROM TBEB_ORGAN T1, TBEC_RACER_MASTER T2, (SELECT T3.*, TO_CHAR (TO_DATE (T4.RACE_DAY, 'YYYYMMDD'),'DY','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = ENGLISH') RACE_DY FROM TBEC_APPO_EXERC_ORGAN T3, VW_RACE_DAY_ORD T4 WHERE T3.STND_YEAR = T4.STND_YEAR AND T3.MBR_CD = T4.MBR_CD AND T3.TMS = T4.TMS AND T3.DAY_ORD = T4.DAY_ORD AND T4.ORGAN_STAT_CD = '002' ) T3 WHERE T1.RACER_NO = T2.RACER_NO AND T1.RACER_NO = T3.RACER_NO(+) AND T1.STND_YEAR = T3.STND_YEAR(+) AND T1.MBR_CD = T3.MBR_CD(+) AND T1.TMS = T3.TMS(+) AND T1.STND_YEAR = ? AND T1.MBR_CD = ? AND T1.TMS = ? AND T1.DAY_ORD = ? AND T1.RACE_NO = ? UNION -- 화요일 1R 성적 SELECT T1.RACE_NO , T1.RACER_NO , T2.NM_KOR , T2.RACER_PERIO_NO , T1.RACER_GRD_CD , T1.RACE_REG_NO , T1.RANK , TO_CHAR(T1.STAR_TM, '0.99') STAR_TM , NVL(T3.DAY_ORD, 0) DAY_ORD , 0 SORT_ORD , REPLACE(CASE WHEN START_FLYING_CNT_1_0 > 0 THEN 'F' WHEN START_LATE_CNT_1_0 > 0 THEN 'L' END || TO_CHAR(T3.START_TM_1_0, '0.99'), ' ', '') START_TM_1 --F, L이 있으면 항주타임에 같이 표시 , REPLACE(CASE WHEN START_FLYING_CNT_2_0 > 0 THEN 'F' WHEN START_LATE_CNT_2_0 > 0 THEN 'L' END || TO_CHAR(T3.START_TM_2_0, '0.99'), ' ', '') START_TM_2 --F, L이 있으면 항주타임에 같이 표시 , REPLACE(CASE WHEN START_FLYING_CNT_3_0 > 0 THEN 'F' WHEN START_LATE_CNT_3_0 > 0 THEN 'L' END || TO_CHAR(T3.START_TM_3_0, '0.99'), ' ', '') START_TM_3 --F, L이 있으면 항주타임에 같이 표시 , TO_CHAR(T3.RUN_TM_0, '0.99') RUN_TM , T3.RACE_DY FROM TBEB_ORGAN T1, TBEC_RACER_MASTER T2, (SELECT T3.*, TO_CHAR (TO_DATE (T4.RACE_DAY, 'YYYYMMDD'),'DY','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = ENGLISH') RACE_DY FROM TBEC_APPO_EXERC_ORGAN T3, VW_RACE_DAY_ORD T4 WHERE T3.STND_YEAR = T4.STND_YEAR AND T3.MBR_CD = T4.MBR_CD AND T3.TMS = T4.TMS AND T3.DAY_ORD = T4.DAY_ORD AND T4.ORGAN_STAT_CD = '002' ) T3 WHERE T1.RACER_NO = T2.RACER_NO AND T1.RACER_NO = T3.RACER_NO(+) AND T1.STND_YEAR = T3.STND_YEAR(+) AND T1.MBR_CD = T3.MBR_CD(+) AND T1.TMS = T3.TMS(+) AND T3.DAY_ORD = 0 AND T1.STND_YEAR = ? AND T1.MBR_CD = ? AND T1.TMS = ? AND T1.DAY_ORD = ? AND T1.RACE_NO = ? ) A , ( -- 상금현황 SELECT T3.RACER_NO, SUM(SUPP_AMT_01 + SUPP_AMT_02 + SUPP_AMT_03 + SUPP_AMT_04 + SUPP_AMT_05 + SUPP_AMT_06 + SUPP_AMT_07 + SUPP_AMT_08 + SUPP_AMT_09) SUPP_TOT_AMT FROM TBEB_ORGAN T1, TBEG_MONTH_PAY T3 WHERE T1.STND_YEAR = T3.STND_YEAR AND PAY_MONTH BETWEEN 1 AND ( SELECT TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(RACE_DAY,5,2)) FROM TBEB_RACE_DAY_ORD WHERE STND_YEAR = ? AND MBR_CD = ? AND TMS = ? AND DAY_ORD = ? ) AND PAY_TPE='1' AND T1.STND_YEAR= ? AND T1.MBR_CD = ? AND T1.TMS = ? AND T1.DAY_ORD = ? AND T1.RACE_NO = ? AND T1.RACER_NO = T3.RACER_NO GROUP BY T3.RACER_NO ) B WHERE A.RACER_NO = B.RACER_NO ORDER BY RACE_NO, RACE_REG_NO, SORT_ORD

SELECT /* tbec_racer_edu_data_fc007 */ DISTINCT TORGAN.RACE_NO , TORGAN.RACER_NO , TRM.NM_KOR , TRM.RACER_PERIO_NO , TORGAN.RACER_GRD_CD , TORGAN.RACE_REG_NO , GET_LAST_RANK_LIST(TORGAN.STND_YEAR,TORGAN.MBR_CD,TORGAN.TMS,TORGAN.DAY_ORD,TORGAN.RACE_NO,TORGAN.RACER_NO,10) RANK -- 최근 10경주 성적 불러오는 함수 , TO_CHAR(TORGAN.STAR_TM, '0.99') STAR_TM , TSC.CD VOIL_CD , TSC.CD_NM VOIL_NM , NVL(DECODE(TRST.QURT_CD, '001', TRRAS.BF_AVG_ACDNT_SCR, '002', TRRAS.AF_AVG_ACDNT_SCR), 0) AVG_ACDNT_SCR -- 성적반영분기코드에따라 전반기/후반기 구분 , ( SELECT COUNT(VOIL_CD) FROM TBED_RACE_VOIL_ACT VOIL WHERE VOIL.STND_YEAR = TORGAN.STND_YEAR AND VOIL.MBR_CD = TORGAN.MBR_CD AND LPAD(VOIL.TMS, 2, '0') || VOIL.DAY_ORD || VOIL.RACE_NO <= LPAD(TORGAN.TMS, 2, '0') || TORGAN.DAY_ORD || TORGAN.RACE_NO AND VOIL.VOIL_CD = TSC.CD AND VOIL.RACER_NO = TORGAN.RACER_NO AND VOIL.VOIL_CD IS NOT NULL AND VOIL.VOIL_CD NOT IN ('993','994','998') -- 결장제외(F퇴소결장, L퇴소결장, 결장(면책)) ) VOIL_CNT FROM TBEB_ORGAN TORGAN , TBEC_RACER_MASTER TRM , TBEA_SPEC_CD TSC , TBEB_RACE_TMS TRT , TBEB_RECD_STND_TERM TRST -- 성적반영분기코드 , ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY TRRAS.RACER_NO ORDER BY APLY_DT DESC) RANK , TRRAS.* FROM TBEB_RACER_RECD_ACCU_SUM TRRAS WHERE TRRAS.APLY_DT < ( SELECT MIN(TRDO.RACE_DAY) RACE_DAY FROM TBEB_RACE_DAY_ORD TRDO WHERE TRDO.STND_YEAR = ? AND TRDO.MBR_CD = ? AND TRDO.TMS = ? ) AND MBR_CD = '000' AND TMS = 0 AND TRRAS.ST_MTHD_CD = '000' --ST방식전체설정 ) WHERE RANK = 1 ) TRRAS -- 선수최근성적 WHERE TORGAN.STND_YEAR = ? AND TORGAN.MBR_CD = ? AND TORGAN.TMS = ? AND TORGAN.DAY_ORD = ? AND TORGAN.RACE_NO = ? AND TORGAN.RACER_NO = TRM.RACER_NO AND TSC.GRP_CD = 'E00035' AND TSC.CD NOT IN('993','994','998') -- 결장제외(F퇴소결장, L퇴소결장, 결장(면책)) AND TORGAN.STND_YEAR = TRT.STND_YEAR AND TORGAN.MBR_CD = TRT.MBR_CD AND TORGAN.TMS = TRT.TMS AND TRT.STR_DT >= TRST.STR_DT AND TRT.END_DT <= TRST.END_DT AND TORGAN.RACER_NO = TRRAS.RACER_NO ORDER BY TORGAN.RACE_REG_NO, TSC.CD
SELECT /* tbec_racer_edu_data_fc008 */ STND_YEAR , MBR_CD , TMS , DAY_ORD , RACE_NO , CNTNT FROM TBEC_RACER_EDU_DATA WHERE STND_YEAR = ? AND MBR_CD = ? AND TMS = ? AND DAY_ORD = ? AND RACE_NO = ?

INSERT /* tbec_racer_edu_data_ic001 */ INTO TBEC_RACER_EDU_DATA ( STND_YEAR -- 기준년도 , MBR_CD -- 경정장코드 , TMS -- 회차 , DAY_ORD -- 일차 , RACE_NO -- 경주번호 , CNTNT -- 특이사항 , INST_ID -- 작성자ID , INST_DTM -- 작성일시 , UPDT_ID -- 수정자ID , UPDT_DTM -- 수정일시 ) VALUES ( ? -- 기준년도 , ? -- 경정장코드 , ? -- 회차 , ? -- 일차 , ? -- 경주번호 , ? -- 특이사항 , ? -- 작성자ID , SYSDATE -- 작성일시 , ? -- 수정자ID , SYSDATE -- 수정일시 )

UPDATE /* tbec_racer_edu_data_uc001 */ TBEC_RACER_EDU_DATA SET CNTNT = ? -- 특이사항 , UPDT_ID = ? -- 수정자ID , UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE -- 수정일시 WHERE STND_YEAR = ? -- 기준년도 AND MBR_CD = ? -- 경정장코드 AND TMS = ? -- 회차 AND DAY_ORD = ? -- 일차 AND RACE_NO = ? -- 경주번호
DELETE /* tbec_racer_edu_data_dc001 */ FROM TBEC_RACER_EDU_DATA WHERE STND_YEAR = ? -- 기준년도 AND MBR_CD = ? -- 경정장코드 AND TMS = ? -- 회차 AND DAY_ORD = ? -- 일차 AND RACE_NO = ? -- 경주번호
